main event: An individual reported observing a single unidentified object in Burnettown, S.C. that resembled a large star but exhibited movement and color changes over a 30-minute observation period.
interesting points: The object was stationary but appeared to change color twice the size of a star., The object was observed for a total of 30 minutes., The report suggested the object might be a probable astronomical phenomenon., No photographs or physical evidence were found to verify the sighting., The observer described the object as significantly larger than a typical star.
sighted object: a large, stationary object resembling a star
witness description: One observer who noted the object's unusual characteristics during the sighting.
